item.title: Duterte on Feast of the Immaculate Conception: Let us emulate Mary's qualities - CNN Philippines
item.description:
Duterte on Feast of the Immaculate Conception: Let us emulate Mary's qualities  CNN Philippines

Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 8) - Following recent tirades against the Catholic Church, President Rodrigo Duterte on Saturday said he joins the faithful in commemorating the Feast of the Immaculate Conception. In a message from Malacañang signed by the President, he hailed Virgin Mary, the mother of Jesus Christ, for her simplicity, kindness and humility. "Let us emulate Mary's qualities as a humble and caring person and remain guided by her faithfulness as we strengthen our devotion and nurture our lives with unconditional love and good deeds that will benefit the Filipino peopl...

item.title: Duterte urges Catholic faithful to emulate Mary's 'selflessness' - SunStar Philippines
item.description:
Duterte urges Catholic faithful to emulate Mary's 'selflessness'  SunStar Philippines

DESPITE his recent tirades against Catholic Church leaders, President Rodrigo Duterte on Saturday, December 8, joined the Catholic faithful in commemorating the Feast of the Immaculate Conception of Mary. Duterte, in a message, called on his fellow Filipinos to emulate Mary's "selflessness." Tweets by sunstaronline He was hopeful that the narrative of Mary's Immaculate Conception would serve as a "constant reminder" of her humility and thoughtfulness when she accepted the invitation to be Christ's mother so that the plan of salvation would be realized. "I join the entire Filipino Catholic C...

item.title: Study: Young gay men most at risk for HIV infections in PH - ABS CBN News
item.description:
ABS CBN News

The Philippines is facing an alarming rise in human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infections. The population most at risk for infection has now shifted from sex workers to young gay men. - The World Tonight, ANC, December 8, 2016

item.title: December 8 declared a special non-working holiday for Catholic feast - CNN Philippines
item.description:
December 8 declared a special non-working holiday for Catholic feast  CNN Philippines

Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 29) — Classes and work are to be suspended yearly on December 8 after President Rodrigo Duterte signed a law declaring it a special non-working holiday for a Catholic feast. Duterte on Thursday inked Republic Act no. 10966, "An act declaring December 8 of every year a special non-working holiday in the entire country to commemorate the Feast of the Immaculate Conception of Mary." A copy of the law was released to the media on Friday. It was earlier passed by the House of Representatives and the Senate on May 2 and December 11, respectively. Employees ...

item.title: December 8 now officially non-working holiday in the Philippines - Rappler
item.description:
December 8 now officially non-working holiday in the Philippines  Rappler

MANILA, Philippines – In the “predominantly Catholic” Philippines, December 8 will now be a special non-working holiday, thanks to a measure signed into law on December 28, 2017. Republic Act Number 10966 was signed by Duterte into law on December 28, 2017. A Copy of the Republic Act was transmitted to Congress – both the House and the Senate on December 29. The act’s full name is: “An Act Declaring December 8 of Every Year A Special Nonworking Holiday in the Entire Country to Commemorate the Feast of the Immaculate Conception of Mary, the Principal Patroness of the Philippines.” The measur...

item.title: December 8 is a special non-working holiday - Sun.Star Philippines
item.description:
December 8 is a special non-working holiday  Sun.Star Philippines

PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte has signed into law the bill declaring December 8 a special non-working holiday nationwide in commemoration of the feast of the Immaculate Conception of Mary. House Majority Leader and Ilocos Rep. Rodolfo Fariñas was the author of House Bill 5241, adopted in the Senate as Senate Bill 1430. The law, signed by Duterte on Friday, December 29, seeks to honor Mary under the title of Immaculate Conception as principal patronness of the Philippines. Fariñas earlier said the bill will allow Filipinos to profess their devotion to Mary through the practices encouraged by the...

item.title: #WalangPasok: Class, work suspensions, Friday, December 8 - Rappler
item.description:
#WalangPasok: Class, work suspensions, Friday, December 8  Rappler

Please refresh this page for updates. MANILA, Philippines (4th UPDATE) – Here is a list of schools where work and classes have been suspended for Friday, December 8, in observance of various occasions: Metro Manila - Colegio de San Juan de Letran - classes and office work, Feast of the Immaculate Conception - University of Santo Tomas - classes and office work, Feast of the Immaculate Conception - Taguig City - special non-working day, cityhood anniversary Luzon - Agoo, La Union - special non-working day, 439th founding anniversary of the municipality - Antipolo City - special non-working ...
